description:
Works as expected. For some reason, my whatsapp (on my phone) thinks I'm running whatsapp web on Mac OS?

So far, so good.
pssible full screen.works better in dark also.cpnvenient,reliable.
summary: great app .i strongly support this app

description: Fast, stable, bug-free. No nonsense web wrapper that feels exactly like a native app. Great job dev!
just download and use it,better than whatsdesk.
works as expected
summary: best ever whatsapp client for linux

description: Dark theme working as expected in Fedora 34
Installed without apparent errors. However failed to launch from Discover, no error was apparent.
Just work after close the web

dark mode is the only thing that works.
quitting from system tray doesnot stop the app, still runs in background.
closing the app with 'X' button doesnot close the app. so only way to quit is by ending process.
cannot adjust zoom level, fullscreen is mentioned but doesnot work, some of the whatsapp in-built keyboard shortcuts donot work.
using ubuntu 20.04 LTS.
summary: 2 out of 4 mentioned features donot work

description: I read the other reviews saying this is meant to be the best, yet Dark Mode switches to Dark for a few seconds then reverts to light. Uninstalling now.
Best WhatsApp web client I ever used.
The app looks and works great, but it doesn't minimize to tray at all. It straight up closes down.
So Cool, Works in background like the orignal app. I hope they make a whatsapp api so that other third party apps can use the calling functionality :(
summary: Superb! I love the backgroud functionality and works very fast

description: Works well when running, but cannot exit, close or end process on it. The only option in closing is to kill it. I also seem to see a bit more CPU usuage than others when running.

this one is updated:

### flatpak
`flatpak install com.github.eneshecan.WhatsAppForLinux`
### Github
[](https://github.com/eneshecan/whatsapp-for-linux)
Es exactamente lo que buscaba y esperaba. La aplicación tiene una interfaz muy intuitiva y sincroniza genial.
Hasta ahora, todo funciona bien. No he probado el ícono de sistema.
Una aplicación muy útil, pero no funciona la opción de arrastrar archivos desde nautilus para compartirlos con algún contacto.
summary: Cómodo pero le faltan algunos detalles

description: Pero alenta a mi sistema y no permite cosas como el pegado de capturas de pantalla
Hi Dear Developers, you application is much more userfiendly than analogs, BUT there is no Spell checking options - please add such important functions.
